version.description: Current version number. This field should be updated automatically.

license.description: License ID. This field should be a valid SPDX license identifier.

url.description: URL template of target file. {version} will be replaced by version number.

hash.description: SHA256SUM of target file. This field is auto-generated and should not be edited.

regex.description: Regex for version checking. Must contain one capturing group to capture the version number.
